Resolved Question Show me another » Ten steps to restaurant service?
3 years ago Report Abuse by Taz Member since: February 26, 2009 Total points: 818 (Level 2) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Voters 1) Treat everyone like friends and family. 2) Make knowledgeable and informed recommendations. 3) Gather information (Time Constraints, Special Occasions Etc.) 4) Be precise when entering in a guests order. 5) Check back frequently for refills and concerns 6) Use spare time effectively Run food for people and Pre-Bus 7) Offer deserts, ask how things were be sociable. 8) Return the Check in a timely fashion 9) Thank your guests and welcome them back with a smile. 10)End of the day take care of your buss person, bartender and host. They will take care of you. Source(s): Restaurant Service for nearly 10 years 3 years ago Report Abuse 33% 3 Votes 1 person rated this as good

Other Answers (6) Show: All Answers Oldest to Newest Newest to Oldest Rated Highest to Lowest by Katie 76 Member since: May 21, 2007 Total points: 2,188 (Level 3) Add Contact Block acknowledge them when they come in get them seated asap ask them about drinks and starters right away don't make them wait give them the specials don't make them ask suggestions if they're not sure what they want the person who takes the order needs to be the one to bring out the order that same person needs to check back after a couple of minutes Act like you care and not like you have 8 other tables to take care of smile show some teeth please talk to the whole table not just the man. 3 years ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Rick Member since: September 28, 2007 Total points: 4,232 (Level 4) Add Contact Block Approach table...take drink order...serve drink Take dinner order Put order in Bring appetizer if applicable...Clear Bring soup/salad...Clear Bring entree Wait 3-5 minutes- discreetly somewhere- not hovering Ask if everything is O.K.>>specifically if the steak is cooked alright Let them enjoy their meal. Look for eye contact, don't make them snap their fingers at you if they need something Clear dinner, offer dessert, coffee Clear dessert. Ask if there's anything else, present check. 3 years ago Report Abuse 11% 1 Vote by Paul W Member since: February 22, 2009 Total points: 107 (Level 1) Add Contact Block personally when I go in to a restaurant I like the place to be clean, staff to be nice, drink cup refilled, if something has gone wrong take ownership of the problem and solve the problem quickly if something arises, invite me to come back Source(s): what I like 3 years ago Report Abuse 11% 1 Vote by hugsandh...
